SETUP
```{r collapse=TRUE}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggridges)
library(p8105.datasets)
```

```{r collapse=TRUE}
data("weather_df")
```

Basic Scatterplot
```{r collapse=TRUE}
ggplot(weather_df, aes(x = tmin, y = tmax)) +
  geom_point()
```
vs
```{r collapse=TRUE}
weather_df |>
  ggplot(aes(x = tmin, y = tmax)) + 
  geom_point()
```

Advanced Scatterplot
```{r collapse=TRUE}
weather_df |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = tmin, y = tmax)) + 
  geom_point(aes(color = name))
```
```{r collapse=TRUE}
weather_df |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = tmin, y = tmax)) + 
  geom_point(aes(color = name), alpha = .5) +
  geom_smooth(se = FALSE)
```
```{r collapse=TRUE}
weather_df |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = tmin, y = tmax, color = name)) + 
  geom_point(alpha = .5) +
  geom_smooth(se = FALSE) + 
  facet_grid(. ~ name)
```
```{r collapse=TRUE}
weather_df |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = date, y = tmax, color = name)) + 
  geom_point(aes(size = prcp), alpha = .5) +
  geom_smooth(se = FALSE) + 
  facet_grid(. ~ name)
```
Learning Assessment
```{r collapse=TRUE}
weather_df |> 
  filter(name == "CentralPark_NY") |> 
  mutate(
    tmax_F = (tmax * (9/5)) + 32,
    tmin_F = (tmin * (9/5)) + 32,
    tmax_C = tmax,
    tmin_C = tmin
  ) |> 
  select(-tmax, -tmin)
```
